name: Bedlam (itch) (PatrickMalara)
description:
BEDLAM

This game was made in a week. I'm doing a game a week and this is what I came up with. And I didn't feel like making a menu. I will probably update the game in the future with a menu, music. and animations.

PRESS: 1 AND 2 to Switch to different COLOR PALETTES!!!
